glsa.title: OpenVPN: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in OpenVPN, allowing remote attackers to read encrypted traffic.

background.p: OpenVPN is a multi-platform, full-featured SSL VPN solution.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in OpenVPN. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker may be able to recover plaintext from an encrypted communication. Another vulnerability could allow remote attacker perform a Man-in-the-Middle attack.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All OpenVPN users should upgrade to the latest version:
